snippet: Sunderland, looking for the win that could take them off the bottom of the Premier League when they host Watford on Saturday, have suffered another injury blow with Jan Kirchhoff having suffered a cartilage tear....

headline.main: Basement Club Sunderland Suffer Further Injury Blow
headline.print_headline: Basement Club Sunderland Suffer Further Injury Blow

lead_paragraph: Sunderland, looking for the win that could take them off the bottom of the Premier League when they host Watford on Saturday, have suffered another injury blow with Jan Kirchhoff having suffered a cartilage tear.

snippet: Middlesbrough manager Aitor Karanka will forget about friendship to focus on outwitting his mentor Jose Mourinho when his team face a resurgent Manchester United at Old Trafford in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Karanka Looks to Put One Over Old Pal Mourinho
headline.print_headline: Karanka Looks to Put One Over Old Pal Mourinho

lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough manager Aitor Karanka will forget about friendship to focus on outwitting his mentor Jose Mourinho when his team face a resurgent Manchester United at Old Trafford in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: In one sense, normality has returned to the English Premier League after the craziness of Leicester's improbable surge to the title last season....

headline.main: Chelsea, Conte Standing Out as Normality Returns to EPL
headline.print_headline: Chelsea, Conte Standing Out as Normality Returns to EPL

lead_paragraph: In one sense, normality has returned to the English Premier League after the craziness of Leicester's improbable surge to the title last season.

snippet: Caretaker manager Alan Curtis has urged Swansea City's under-achieving squad to "show a bit more spirit and fight", starting with Saturday's home game against Bournemouth....

headline.main: Ugly Ducklings Must Turn Into Beautiful Swans-Curtis
headline.print_headline: Ugly Ducklings Must Turn Into Beautiful Swans-Curtis

lead_paragraph: Caretaker manager Alan Curtis has urged Swansea City's under-achieving squad to "show a bit more spirit and fight", starting with Saturday's home game against Bournemouth.

snippet: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy will serve a three-match suspension after the club's appeal against his dismissal during Saturday's 2-2 Premier League draw with Stoke City was rejected, the Football Association (FA) said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Leicester's Vardy to Serve Three-Game Ban After Appeal Rejected
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Vardy to Serve Three-Game Ban After Appeal Rejected

lead_paragraph: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy will serve a three-match suspension after the club's appeal against his dismissal during Saturday's 2-2 Premier League draw with Stoke City was rejected, the Football Association (FA) said on Tuesday.

snippet: Police overseeing the sex abuse scandal in British soccer say 83 potential suspects have been identified and linked to 98 clubs....

lead_paragraph: Police overseeing the sex abuse scandal in British soccer say 83 potential suspects have been identified and linked to 98 clubs.

snippet: Sunderland have signed central defender Lamine Kone from FC Lorient on a four-and-a-half-year contract, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Sunderland have signed central defender Lamine Kone from FC Lorient on a four-and-a-half-year contract, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

snippet: - The powerful presence of Andy Carroll inspired West Ham United to beat Burnley 1-0 at the London Stadium on Wednesday and move away from the Premier League relegation zone....

headline.main: Carroll Makes Mark as West Ham See Off Burnley
headline.print_headline: Carroll Makes Mark as West Ham See Off Burnley

lead_paragraph: - The powerful presence of Andy Carroll inspired West Ham United to beat Burnley 1-0 at the London Stadium on Wednesday and move away from the Premier League relegation zone.

snippet: Italy defender Leonardo Bonucci has extended his contract with Serie A champions Juventus until 2021, the club said on Monday (www.juventus.com)....

headline.main: Italy Defender Bonucci Extends Juventus Contract
headline.print_headline: Italy Defender Bonucci Extends Juventus Contract

lead_paragraph: Italy defender Leonardo Bonucci has extended his contract with Serie A champions Juventus until 2021, the club said on Monday (www.juventus.com).

snippet: Hull City winger Robert Snodgrass is expected to be out of action for upto a month after suffering ankle ligament damage during the defeat against Stoke City, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Hull's Snodgrass Ruled Out for Upto a Month After Ligament Damage
headline.print_headline: Hull's Snodgrass Ruled Out for Upto a Month After Ligament Damage

lead_paragraph: Hull City winger Robert Snodgrass is expected to be out of action for upto a month after suffering ankle ligament damage during the defeat against Stoke City, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.
